main event: On 12 January 1955, a flight observer reported seeing a chromic pink object approximately 6 inches in size at an altitude of 20,000 feet, traveling northward and maneuvering quickly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed for about two minutes,The object was estimated to be 20,000 feet above and traveling at a relatively fast speed,There was a possibility that the sighting could be explained as an optical phenomenon,The sighting involved a single observer,The observer's identity was noted but no other witnesses were reported.
